name: The Last Witch Hunt
description:
Relive the catastrophic events of “The Last Witch Hunt” in a 2D top down life simulation as a witch who hopes of being the last witch standing on earth.

Players must infiltrate the medieval villages by acting as "non-magical" humans in the eyes of AI-guided mistrustful villagers, while devising the best way to blow other players' cover to ensure victory and live for another day.

In order to infiltrate among the villagers, each player must complete various tasks related to a “secondary job” in a certain amount of time to avoid the hatred of the suspicious citizens that don’t want slackers in their village.

Nevertheless, one's witch true nature cannot be erased completely, so the players must also worship the Devil, who in return will give to the most clever one the power to change the fate of the game.
